title: Lovers Of The Red Sky
description:
Description :
        On a Winter night, the painter Hong Cheon Gi, clashes with a man who falls from the sky.
She believe this beautiful looking man--who does not seem to be from this world--is her destined man because of this encounter.
Ha Ram is a man who became blind after being caught up in an unknown accident as a child.
Although he can only see red, after meeting Cheon Gi, he learns the secret surrounding his eyes...
